name: berry bonnet cat
notes:
berry bonnet cat – amigurumi crochet pattern

meet the berry bonnet cat – an adorable crocheted kitty wearing a fruity bonnet! whether your cat prefers to dress as a blueberry, cherry tomato, or strawberry, this sweet little amigurumi will steal your heart. the perfect project for gifting, collecting, or simply brightening your workspace.

finished size: approx. 10.5 cm (4 inches) tall
skill level: beginner to intermediate
languages: english
includes: detailed written instructions + photos

stitches used
ch - chain,
sc - single crochet,
hdc - half double crochet,
dc - double crochet,
inc - 2-single crochet increase, 
dec - 2-single crochet decrease,
dec3 - 3-single crochet decrease, 
dc dec - 2-double crochet decrease,
slst - slip stitch,
mr - magic ring.

 customizable bonnet:
choose your cat’s fruity personality – blueberry, cherry tomato, or strawberry (with cute seed embroidery)! each bonnet ties under the chin and features a whimsical fruit-inspired shape.

 materials:

* 3.5 mm (us 4) crochet hook,
* white acrilic yarn for the cat body, red and green for a tomato bonnet, blue for a blueberry, red, green and light yellow for a strawberry, 100g-225m,
* stuffing for toys (f.e. polyfill)
* pink sewing thread,
* tapestry and sewing needles,
* scissors,
* stitch marker,
* 5mm safety pin eyes.

 perfect for:
gifts, keychains, desk buddies, or as part of a fruity amigurumi collection.
